entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023
